name: Sony NWM Display Screen File
summary: Learn about .NWM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: An NWM image file can be transferred to a supported Walkman by following these instructions:
Download / save the NWM file to your computer.
Connect the Network Walkman to your PC with a USB cable.
Open "My Computer" and you should see a new Removable Drive, most likely the E: Drive.
Open the drive and look for a folder called "NWWM-SCR." If the folder does not exist, create a new folder named "NWWM-SCR."
Copy the NWM file from your computer to the NWWM-SCR folder on the Network Walkman. (Only one file should be placed in the folder at a time.)
Eject (or unmount) the Walkman in Windows, then disconnect it from your computer.
Turn on the Network Walkman and hold the Search/Menu button until the menu is displayed.
Select "Display Screen" and press the Play/Stop button to select the new display screen option.
